scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Document signed by James Semple, with a detailed description of land for sale in Williamsburg, and a sketch of the buildings on the lot. Houses were originally erected on the land by Dr. Pasteur. The property is currently known as the William Finnie property, 506 E. Francis St. Mentions Mr. Bassett's land.
